meta.name: og:description
meta.content: Illinois' new online school report card goes beyond test scores to present a complete view of your schools. The information here will help you to work with your child's school

header.class: navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-dark bg-dark text-white box-shadow

div.p: You select the schools, and this tool provides comparisons of Fast Facts, Academic Progress, and School Environment.
You select schools with similar factors and then see comparisons on several measures of School Characteristics, Test Performance, Demographics, and Finance.
